name: The Pumpkin Ritual
description:
The Pumpkin Ritual

----------------------------------------------

Controls:

Move: W A S D

Shoot: Left Click

Pause: Esc

----------------------------------------------

Gameplay:

- Collect pumpkins (By shooting them)

- Scare crows away (By shooting them)

- Defeat boss (By shooting it)

- Win game :) (By shooting)

----------------------------------------------

Info:

Game made for AAU Jam - Fall 2022

But didn't upload in time :((
